product_name: Quixote Classic PrimaLoft Pillow with Pillowcase - Small - 2014 Closeout
long_description: This supersoft travel and camping pillow uses the finest synthetic down microfibers and a lightweight technical shell to create an incredibly comfortable, compressible and versatile travel pillow.
short_description: This supersoft travel and camping pillow uses the finest synthetic down microfibers and a lightweight technical shell to create an incredibly comfortable, compressible and versatile travel pillow.
